results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = (n+1-k)*Fibonacci(n+2-k), for n>=1, 1<=k<=n.
comment: The first column is A023607 (without the leading zero).
link: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
example: Rows 1,2,3,4,5,6 and columns 1,2,3,4,5,6 of the triangle are:
Reading the rows backwards gives an initial segment of the terms of A023607 (but without the initial zero).
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Mar 26 2005
